ReasonReference: R4E06-US20: add info icons to add manure modal

Data.Name: AmmoniumRetensionMessage
Data.Text: This value is an estimate of how much volatile ammoniums is retained in the manure after application.  Manure type, and the timing and method of application affect retention.

Data.Name: AvailableOrganicNitrogenMessage
Data.Text: This value is an estimate of how much of the stable organic nitrogen in manure will become available during the growing season.

Data.Name: AvailableNutrientsThisYearMessage
Data.Text: These values represent the estimated amount of nutrients available to the crop during the growing season from the manure at the calculated application rate.  These will be added to the Agronomic Balance.

Data.Name: AvaiableNutreintsLongTermMessage
Data.Text: These values represent the estimated amount nutrients added to the soil from the manure at the calculated application rate.  These will be added to the Crop Removal Balance.
